titleStmt.title: XXXVI sermons viz. XVI ad aulam, VI ad clerum, VI ad magistratum, VIII ad populum : with a large preface / by the right reverend father in God, Robert Sanderson, late lord bishop of Lincoln ; whereunto is now added the life of the reverend and learned author, written by Isaac Walton.
titleStmt.author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
Walton, Izaak, 1593-1683.

editionStmt.edition: The eighth edition, corrected and amended.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Tooke, T. Passenger, and T. Sawbridge, and are to be sold by Thomas Hodgkin ...,

notesStmt.note: "The life of Dr. Sanderson ..." has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Edition statement precedes listing of the life of Dr. Sanderson, on t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Emanuel College Library, Cambridge University.
